languages.text: "Насколько мне известно, приказ исходил от Кунрада Войгтвира, Мастера шепотов в свите Вольного Торговца. Вероятно, он лично или через доверенных людей организовал доставку".

traits.locale_text: "Насколько мне известно, приказ исходил от Кунрада Войгтвира, Мастера шепотов в свите Вольного Торговца. Вероятно, он лично или через доверенных людей организовал доставку".

languages.text: "As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."
languages.original_text: "Насколько мне известно, приказ исходил от Кунрада Войгтвира, Мастера шепотов в свите Вольного Торговца. Вероятно, он лично или через доверенных людей организовал доставку".

traits.locale_text: "As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."

"I am not privy to this information, and I am afraid that no one was, save for the Captain — and he can no longer be questioned. All I know is that the order came through the private channels of your trade empire." {n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I have almost convinced myself that the Rogue Trader deliberately collects Chaos artifacts."

"As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."

"I am not privy to this information, and I am afraid that no one was, save for the captain — and he can no longer be questioned. All I know is that the order came through the private channels of your trade empire." {n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I have almost convinced myself that the Rogue Trader deliberately collects Chaos artifacts."

"I am not privy to this information, and I am afraid that no one was, save for the captain — and he can no longer be questioned. All I know is that the order came through the private channels of your protectorate."

"As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."

"As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."

languages.text: 「私が知る限り、今回の依頼は自由開拓者の従者である囁きの主、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルからでした。個人的に、あるいは仲介者を介して配送を手配した可能性が高いかと思われます」
languages.original_text: "As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."

traits.locale_text: 「私が知る限り、今回の依頼は自由開拓者の従者である囁きの主、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルからでした。個人的に、あるいは仲介者を介して配送を手配した可能性が高いかと思われます」

languages.text: “据我所知，货运命令来自行商浪人舰队中的低语之主，昆拉德·维特威尔。很可能是他本人，或是通过中间人，安排了这次货运。”
languages.original_text: "As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."

traits.locale_text: “据我所知，货运命令来自行商浪人舰队中的低语之主，昆拉德·维特威尔。很可能是他本人，或是通过中间人，安排了这次货运。”

languages.text: «Por lo que sé, la orden vino de Kunrad Voigtvir, el maestro de susurros del séquito de la Comerciante Independiente. Es probable que organizara la entrega, ya sea personalmente o mediante intermediarios».
languages.original_text: "As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."

traits.locale_text: «Por lo que sé, la orden vino de Kunrad Voigtvir, el maestro de susurros del séquito de la Comerciante Independiente. Es probable que organizara la entrega, ya sea personalmente o mediante intermediarios».

languages.text: « De ce que je sais, l'ordre initial a été donné par Kunrad Voigtvir, le maître des murmures de l'entourage de la libre-marchande. C'est certainement lui qui a organisé cette livraison, que ce soit personnellement ou via des intermédiaires. »
languages.original_text: "As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."

traits.locale_text: « De ce que je sais, l'ordre initial a été donné par Kunrad Voigtvir, le maître des murmures de l'entourage de la libre-marchande. C'est certainement lui qui a organisé cette livraison, que ce soit personnellement ou via des intermédiaires. »

languages.text: "Soweit ich weiß, kam der Befehl von Kunrad Voigtvir, dem Meister des Geflüsters im Gefolge der Freihändlerin. Wahrscheinlich hat er die Lieferung organisiert, entweder persönlich oder durch Mittelsleute."
languages.original_text: "As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."

traits.locale_text: "Soweit ich weiß, kam der Befehl von Kunrad Voigtvir, dem Meister des Geflüsters im Gefolge der Freihändlerin. Wahrscheinlich hat er die Lieferung organisiert, entweder persönlich oder durch Mittelsleute."

languages.text: "Bildiğim kadarıyla emir, Hür Tacir'in maiyetindeki Fısıltı Üstadı Kunrad Voigtvir'den gelmiş. Teslimatı bizzat veya aracılar yoluyla onun ayarlamış olma ihtimali yüksek."
languages.original_text: "As far as I am aware, the order came from Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers in the Rogue Trader's retinue. It is likely that he arranged the delivery, either personally or through intermediaries."

traits.locale_text: "Bildiğim kadarıyla emir, Hür Tacir'in maiyetindeki Fısıltı Üstadı Kunrad Voigtvir'den geldi. Teslimatı bizzat veya aracılar yoluyla onun ayarlamış olma ihtimali yüksek."
